name: DW
storyline: DW is an adventure/RPG about a world full of drawings. Jake, a human teenager, wakes up one day to find himself stranded in this world. Before long, its local police place him under arrest. His crime? Being human. With nothing but a mysterious paint brush at your disposal, escape the police and explore the colorful world of DW in your journey to find a way back home. But be careful; there are those who would stop at nothing to find a human being and use him for their own purposes...
summary: A story-focused adventure RPG about a boy stranded in a world full of drawings. Explore your way out, help others, and use your disguises and tricks to overcome any obstacles in your way.
